errors.error_description: Specifies overly restrictive exact Python patch versions instead of minimum versions
correction_candidates: Change to minimum version requirements: Python 3.6+ is supported
Use range specification: Python 3.6-3.11 are supported
Simplify to major versions: Python 3.7 or higher recommended
Update to current standards: Python 3.8+ required for optimal performance
errors.golden_answer: Change to minimum version requirements: Python 3.6+ is supported
